description: Part two of Competitive Innovations, and melee meta continues – but not without a fight.  The Thousand Sons continue holding some of the tide at bay in the US, while from down under we’ve got some great insight from a Tau player about their experience challenging the wolf menance. Let’s dig in, today Lowest of Men […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Always Be Charging pt.2

description: Starting development shortly before the great war but not being completed until after the bombs dropped by the Enclave, the X-01 power armour is the most advance suit in existence. Few in number and prized by those who possess them, it’s a formidable weapon in the wasteland. Now the armour is available in hard plastic […]
title: Fallout X-01 Power Armor: The Goonhammer Review

description: There are a fair number of people who like Skaven and Stormcast but an even larger number of people that like other factions in Age of Sigmar. Over the past two weeks we’ve covered Spearhead, the release box, our impressions of actually playing spearhead, and interviewing the first person to win a GW sanctioned spearhead […]
title: Age of Sigmar New Edition – Now With Factions

description: The Unified Tournament Circuit is a regional circuit for Warhammer 40k and Age of Sigmar which covers the area between Virginia and Newfoundland. In case you missed our announcement, you can find it here. You can find the full calendar of UTC events here. Last Weekend’s Event A bit of a quiet weekend, but […]
title: UTC Weekend Recap and Preview: May 31

description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 27

description: If you were a bit busy at 6pm EST on a Thursday to tune in to Sony’s State of Play yesterday, or distracted perhaps by other news going on, we’ve got a rundown of the event for you here! With the Summer Games Show right around the corner, Sony and Konami chose to get the […]
title: Everything Shown at Sony’s State of Play and Silent Hill Transmission

description: We take a look at some of the weirdest rules and most common questions from Codex: Chaos Space Marines.
title: Ruleshammer: Codex Chaos Space Marines, 10th Edition

description: That’s right, it’s happened, it’s really happened! Conquest! If you missed out last announcement about a bunch of features then click here.  Tabletop Battles has so far been Goonhammer’s proprietary app for running and tracking games of Warhammer 40,000, Age of Sigmar, Horus Heresy.  It still has all of that, don’t worry, but we are […]
title: Tabletop Battles Now Supporting Conquest: The Last Argument of Kings
